title: Mullaititivu Tamils: The real Ambassadors of Reconciliation
content: By Shenali Waduge The Mullaitivu district was the preferred home, training and hiding base of the LTTE leader for over 3 decades. It was also where the LTTE met its Waterloo. 30 years of absolutely no changes despite a host of foreign NGO/UN presence has seen remarkable changes in just 3 years something people need…
